notes: The U.S. EPA estimates that more than 350 million rechargeable batteries are purchased annually in the U.S. Thanks to the environmental commitment of this location, its easy and free to recycle your batteries. Bring your rechargeable batteries to this location and look for the recycling box or ask an associate how you can do your part for the environment.

name: Working Bikes Cooperative
hours: Monday: 12:00 PM - 5:00 PM Tuesday: 12:00 PM - 5:00 PM Wednesday: 12:00 PM - 5:00 PM Thursday: 12:00 PM - 5:00 PM Friday: 12:00 PM - 5:00 PM Saturday: 12:00 PM - 5:00 PM
materials: Bikes; Miscellaneous Tools; Bike Parts; Bike Accessories; Cables & Connectors; Cell Phones; Computer (Recycling); Computer Monitors; DVD Players/Blu-Ray Players/DVRs; Electronics; Laptop Computers; MP3 Players; Computer Peripherals; Portable Media Players; Printers/Scanners/Fax Machines; Small Electronics; Small Televisions; Tablets; Televisions; VCRs; Video Game Systems; Blu-Ray Players; Digital Converter Boxes; Video Game Consoles; PlayStation Consoles
notes: Working Bikes needs bicycles, parts, and tools. We accept any style, shape, or condition bicycle. If you have a bicycle that is going unused then we need it. All donations are tax-deductible. We have several drop-off locations for small donations throughout the region. If you have more than a few bikes to donate, call us and we can schedule a pick-up.

name: US Post Office
materials: Inkjet Printer Cartridges; Cables & Connectors; Cell Phones; Computer (Recycling); Computer Monitors; DVD Players/Blu-Ray Players/DVRs; Electronics; Laptop Computers; MP3 Players; Computer Peripherals; Portable Media Players; Printers/Scanners/Fax Machines; Small Electronics; Small Televisions; Tablets; Televisions; VCRs; Video Game Systems; Blu-Ray Players; Digital Converter Boxes; Video Game Consoles; PlayStation Consoles
